verbs.description: SINGAPORE ( AP ) — [ARG0: North Korea] [V: says] [ARG1: President Donald Trump has agreed on a step - by - step denuclearization process by North Korea in return for reciprocal concessions from the United States during a summit with its leader Kim Jong Un] .

SINGAPORE ( AP ) — North Korea says President Donald Trump [V: has] agreed on a step - by - step denuclearization process by North Korea in return for reciprocal concessions from the United States during a summit with its leader Kim Jong Un .

SINGAPORE ( AP ) — North Korea says [ARG0: President Donald Trump] has [V: agreed] [ARG1: on a step - by - step denuclearization process by North Korea] [ARGM-PRP: in return for reciprocal concessions from the United States during a summit with its leader Kim Jong Un] .
